scripts.test: export AUTH_ENV=dev && node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --file src/tests/setup_test.js $(find src/tests/* -name '*.nc.test.js')
scripts.test-complete: export AUTH_ENV=dev && node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --file src/tests/setup_test.js $(find src/tests/* -name '*.complete.test.js')
scripts.test-all: export AUTH_ENV=dev && node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --file src/tests/setup_test.js $(find src/tests/* -name '*.test.js')
